SEARCH
Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
This is an interface for game board. Game board is a 2-D array board of blank spaces. The following interface contains some of the methods which are secondary methods implemented using the primary methods. This game is based on player input makers: 'X' or 'O'. if they have consecutive five makers in any direction, they win. Initialization ensure: Game Board is created with an array of balcnk spaces of size: getNumRows() * getNumColumns Defines: numRow = Z; numCol = Z; numToWin = Z; Constraints : MIN_SIZE invalid input: '<'= rows invalid input: '<'= MAX_ROWS MIN_SIZE invalid input: '<'= cols invalid input: '<'= MAX_COL MIN_SIZE invalid input: '<'= toWin invalid input: '<'= NUM_TO_WIN

  • Method Details

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)
      Places the character token 'p' in column 'c'. The token will be placed in the lowest available row in column 'c'
      Parameters:
      p - The character token to be placed in the column
      c - The column where the token should be placed. colum c is intended to be a colum that is not full

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Retrieves the character at the specified position on the game board
      Parameters:
      pos - is a BoardPosition object that gives the coordinates of a cell.
      Returns:
      Returns The character at position pos, or a blank space character if no marker is there.

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Checks if a player's token is at the specified position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position in grid
      player - The player's token ('X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      Returns true if the player's token is at position pos false otherwise

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Checks if a column can accept another token.
      Parameters:
      c - The column to check.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the column can accept another token, false otherwise.

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Checks if the last token placed in column 'c' resulted in the player winning the game
      Parameters:
      c - The column where the last token was placed
      Returns:
      Returns true if the last token placed in column 'c' resulted in a win, otherwise false

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks if there is a vertical win starting from the given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to start checking from.
      p - The player's token ('X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      Returns true if there are 5 in a row vertically false otherwise

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Detects if a player has won the game by 5 peaces horizontally next to each-other.
      Parameters:
      pos - game-board position of current piece being checked
      p - the piece object being tested if 5 are horizontally next to each other
      Returns:
      Returns true if the same type species are 5 in a row horizontally otherwise returns false

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks if there is a diagonal win starting from the given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to start checking from.
      p - The player's token ('X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      Returns true if there are 5 in a row diagonally false otherwise

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      Function that checks if the player has tied the game or not by using checkIfFree function.
      Returns:
      Returns true if games are tied with every colum being populated with none of the same type of pieces being 5 in a row; horizontally,vertically, and diagonally, otherwise return false

    • getNumRows

      int getNumRows()
      Returns number of rows
      Returns:
      Returns the number of rows.

    • getNumColumns

      int getNumColumns()
      Returns number of rows
      Returns:
      Returns the number of Columns.

    • getNumToWin

      int getNumToWin()
      Returns number of rows
      Returns:
      Returns the number in a row to win.
